pages.text: Found in patches underground, limestone is a new decorative stone type.$(br)$(br)It can be polished and turned into other building blocks similar to granite, andesite or diorite.
When bat guano is introduced to a limestone block, eventually, it starts to dry and crystallise, cracking the block.$(br)$(br)Over time, saltpetre crystals erupt from the cracks.

pages.title: Limestone Geode
pages.text: Festering Limestone can also be found in Limestone Geodes
